sentence: Jack Dorsey gave up his Twitter CEO chair, is a critic of the Twitter board, and claims CNN was staging conflict in Ferguson, Missouri, during the Michael Brown controversy.

title: Whitlock: CNN+ another casualty of Donald Trump's Dead Dems Society'
